#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
        long long int n,pt=0,i,j;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        int a[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
                scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++) {
                 for(j=i+1;j<n;j++) {
                        if(a[j]<a[i]) {
                                pt++;
                        }
                }
        }
        printf("Number of inversions are %lld\n",pt);
        return 0;
}
